metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4484 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Varnish before 3.0.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (child-process crash and temporary caching outage) via a GET request with trailing whitespace characters and no URI.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvarnishapi1 - 3.0.5-2
varnish - 3.0.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: varnish package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.5-2').
